description: Team AI lifecycle hooks for session awareness

hooks.command: bash -c 'if command -v ai-list &>/dev/null; then count=$(ai-list -a 2>/dev/null | grep -c "^[a-f0-9]" || echo 0); echo "Team AI: $count agent(s) currently registered. Use /ai-list to see them."; fi'

bash -c 'if [ -n "$TEAM_AI_AGENT_ID" ] && command -v ai-check &>/dev/null; then pending=$(ai-check $TEAM_AI_AGENT_ID -q 2>/dev/null || echo 0); if [ "$pending" != "0" ]; then echo "Team AI: You have $pending pending message(s). Run ai-check $TEAM_AI_AGENT_ID to view."; fi; fi'
